tool.name: Cell types - get empirical distribution
tool.description: Get empirical distribution for tool performance table
tool.command:
get_empirical_dist.R --input-ref-file "${input_ref_file}" --label-column-ref "${label_col_ref}" --lab-cl-mapping "${lab_cl_mapping}" --num-iterations "${num_iter}" --num-cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} --output-path "${output_list_path}"
#if $parallel --parallel "${parallel}" #end if #if $ontology_graph --ontology-graph "${ontology_graph}" #end if #if $tmpdir --tmpdir "${tmpdir}" #end if #if $sample_labs --sample-labs "${sample_labs}" #end if #if $exclusions --exclusions "${exclusions}" #end if #if $sem_siml_metric --semantic-sim-metric "${sem_siml_metric}" #end if

param.name: input_ref_file
param.label: Input reference file
param.help: Text file with reference cell labels

param.name: lab_cl_mapping
param.label: Label - CL term mapping
param.help: Mapping between cell labels and ontology terms

param.name: parallel
param.label: Parallel execution
param.help: Should the table values be computed in parallel?

param.name: num_iter
param.label: Number of iterations
param.help: Number of simulations to generate empirical CDF

param.name: sample_labs
param.label: Number of labels to sample
param.help: Numbre of labels to sample for each permutation

param.name: ontology_graph
param.label: Ontology graph
param.help: Ontology graph to run semantis similarity computations
